meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>building</radical> standing in the way of the next <radical>chapter</radical> in your life, and it's <kanji>hinder</kanji>ing you. It's not like you couldn't find another way around, but it's definitely inconvenient.
readingMnemonic: Someone put this building here specifically to <kanji>hinder</kanji> you. They knew you were close to the next chapter of your life, and they wanted to hinder you really good. And there they are, sitting on a throne smirking. It's the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう).
